video.desc: Mixed currencies performance in 2016, USD roughly stayed in a range, Positive on AUD and NZD

video.header: Looking for green shoots for a healthy and balanced course of growth
video.desc: Asian equities saw positive signs and observed shifted capital to Asia, amidst low to negative interest rates environment. Moreover, China’s macroeconomic data and the renminbi’s exchange rate have shown signs of stabilizing. What strategies should be adopted when investing in Asian equities?
